statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.ChannelID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
, BB.CustomerName , CC.ChannelName
FROM dbo.BMCustomerChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LMCustomer BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CustomerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.ChannelID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
, BB.CustomerName , CC.ChannelName
FROM dbo.BMCustomerChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LMCustomer BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CustomerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMCustomerChannel ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, CustomerID, ChannelID, StartDate, EndDate ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #CustomerID#, #ChannelID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMCustomerChannel SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , ChannelID = #ChannelID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#
